name: extrinsic_hash
description: Extrinsic Hash of the XCM Transfer

name: extrinsic_id
description: Extrinsic ID of the XCM Transfer

name: transfer_index
description: If the extrinsic contains multiple XCM transfer, this is an zero-based index into the multiple xcm transfers

name: xcm_index
description: If there are multiple assets in a XCM transfer, this is zero-based index into the multiple assets

name: para_id
description: Sending  ParaID -- if 0, then the origin chain is the relay chain

name: para_id_dest
description: Destination ParaID -- if 0, then the destination chain is the relay chain

name: block_time
description: Block time of the block that contains the extrinsic

name: price_usd
description: Value in USD of 1 token of the asset being transferred

name: amount_sent_usd
description: Total value in USD of the asset being transferred

name: amount_received_usd
description: Total value in USD of the asset received

name: xcm_info
description: Data structure containing organized information of the origination and destination chain
